title: Faces of culture
creator_contributor_role: Coast Community College District, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: The long human journey on this planet has taken diverse peoples over countless trails in all cardinal directions. Subtitled "Studies of cultural anthropology", this series looks at some of these directions, and at fundamental patterns common to all cultures. Narrated by David Carradine.
